$eref.description: Filters points based on the value of the specified bitfield attribute.
$eref.title: PointCloud Bitfield Filter

___field.description: The name of the field that is used for the filter.

___requiredClearBits.description: List ALL bit numbers that must cleared (=0) for the point to be kept. bit 0 is LSB.

___requiredSetBits.description: List ALL bit numbers that must set (=1) for the point to be kept. bit 0 is LSB.

$eref.description: Filters points based on the value of the return number/return count.
$eref.title: PointCloud Return Filter

___field.description: The name of the field that is used for the filter.

___includedReturns.description: All points with at least one specified return status will be kept. Status values: `last`, `firstOfMany`, `lastOfMany`, `single`

$eref.description: Filters points based on the value of an specified attribute.
$eref.title: PointCloud Value Filter

___field.description: The name of the field that is used for the filter.

___type.description: Filters points based on the value of an specified attribute.

___mode.description: Defines if values should be included or excluded.

description: Filters applied to the pointCloud which will hide a point.
title: PointCloud Filter
